ResearchProjectDef.label: medieval medicine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Through the study of ancient herbology, poultices, and tincture brewing, your colonists rediscover pre-industrial medical practices. Unlocks the ability to craft tincture medicine, improving treatment beyond simple herbs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: healing cot
ResearchProjectDef.description: Developing specialized medical beds with herbal compression trays and basic instruments. Improves the resting and treatment conditions for ill or injured patients.

ResearchProjectDef.label: healer's stand
ResearchProjectDef.description: Refinements in bedside tools and preparation methods allow for the construction of dedicated healer's stands. When placed beside medical beds, they passively improve treatment outcomes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: visual storytelling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advancements in creating fire-lit devices to project silhouettes and narratives. Enables construction of shadowboxes, allowing patients and idle colonists to find joy in soft imagery.

ResearchProjectDef.label: expanded shadowbox
ResearchProjectDef.description: Refining the structure and mechanics of traditional shadowboxes, this upgrade allows for broader, more elaborate silhouette projections. Enables construction of a larger, more joyful shadow theater.

ResearchProjectDef.label: medieval sanitation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Improved floor smoothing, lime treatments, and cleanliness rituals allow medieval healers to reduce infection risk in their facilities. Unlocks the construction of polished stone tiles that passively boost hospital hygiene.
